data.title: St. Louis Blues vs Pittsburgh Penguins History
data.meta_description: A full list of every game and series played between the Blues and Pittsburgh Penguins in NHL history.
data.text:
What is the all-time head-to-head record between the St. Louis Blues and Pittsburgh Penguins?

The Blues and Penguins have played a total of 168 games against each other, counting the regular season and playoffs. The Blues have an overall record of 83-65-18-2 (54.8%) against the Penguins.

Among only regular season games, the Blues have a 76-59-18-2 (54.8%) record against the Pittsburgh Penguins.

What is the head-to-head record between the St. Louis Blues and Pittsburgh Penguins in the Playoffs?

The Blues and Penguins have met in the playoffs 3 times. The Blues currently lead the Penguins with a 2-1 record in playoffs series. The Blues won the most recent series against the Penguins in the 1981 First Round.

What is the longest winning streak for the St. Louis Blues over the Pittsburgh Penguins?

The longest all-time winning streak that the St. Louis Blues have had over the Penguins is 5 games, and it has happened 2 separate times.

What is the head-to-head record between the St. Louis Blues and Pittsburgh Penguins in 2024?

The Blues and Penguins have played a total of 2 games against each other in the 2023-24 season, in which the Blues have an record of 1-1 (50%) against the Penguins. All the games were played in the regular season.

When was the last game between the St. Louis Blues and Pittsburgh Penguins?
